title: Textile, "Egyptian monuments", ca. 1808
medium: Technique: printed by engraved plate (short plate) on plain weave foundation; plate break line is visible within the leaves above the head of the owl.
dimensions:
Warp: 156 cm (61 3/4 in.). Weft: 99.5 cm (39 1/4 in.). Both edges cut.
Pattern: height of repeat: 51.5 cm (20 1/4 in.)
description: Scenes of Egyptian buildings and obelisks and animals on a background of finely detailed squares. In deep brown/red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Egyptian monuments", ca. 1808.
ca. 1808. Technique: printed by engraved plate (short plate) on plain weave foundation; plate break line is visible within the leaves above the head of the owl.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-61.
